person.persName: Oliver D. Botner (Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Pittsylvania County, Virginia, native. Married to Jane Stafford Burgess Botner. Father of Christopher Columbus Botner, Lydia Botner, Calista Botner, Malinda Botner, Emily Botner, Julia Botner, and Amanda V. Botner. Stepfather of Benjamin Burgess, Taylor Burgess, and Mary Burgess. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from December 10, 1861, to June 5, 1862.
